roleset.name: to scatter
roleset.note: DISPERSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disperse' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from disperse.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Police in Yugoslavia dispersed about 1,000 ethnic Albanians who [*T*-1] were protesting the trial of the former Communist Party chief of the southern province of Kosovo .
example.arg: about 1,000 ethnic Albanians who [*T*-1] were protesting the trial of the former Communist Party chief of the southern province of Kosovo
